name: Slack
description: Slack is a cloud-based collaboration platform that enables teams to communicate, share files, and integrate with various tools through channels, direct messages, and automated workflows.

useCases.name: Alert Notifications
useCases.description: Automatically notify your security team in Slack when new alerts are created in TheHive, with rich formatting and quick action buttons.
useCases.title: Send TheHive alerts to Slack channels

useCases.name: Interactive Incident Response
useCases.description: Manage TheHive cases and tasks directly from Slack using slash commands and interactive modals for faster incident response.
useCases.title: Interactive incident response with Slack slash commands

useCases.name: Investigation Collaboration
useCases.description: Automatically create dedicated Slack channels for each TheHive case, with team members added and updates synced in real-time.
useCases.title: Automated investigation channels for case collaboration

responders.name: Slack_CreateChannel
responders.description: Creates a Slack channel for a TheHive case, invites participants, and optionally posts a case summary and description.

responders.name: Slack_SyncChannel
responders.description: Syncs Slack channel conversations to TheHive task logs. Imports messages chronologically with file attachments for traceability.
